data.title: List of Paramount Pictures films
data.meta_description: This is a list of selected films released by Paramount Pictures. Asterisks (* ) indicate works in the public domain. For Paramount Vantage/Classics releases and DreamWorks live-action films distributed by Paramount, see those articles List of Paramount Pictures films on IMDbScript error: No such...
data.text:
